channel.title: Dark Knight Vs Poison Ivy (Plex wanted me to create something don't blame me)
channel.description:
#[color=00B2EE] DARK KNIGHT [/color]
**Passive**:
* If you Kill your target you become a knight
* Attacking your target gives you 100% power (bypasses Secrete)
**Day Abilities:**
* Conceal - Immune to all death the following night (2 uses)
**Night Abilities:**
* Renegade Assassinate - 50% Chance to Kill Target (1 day cool-down if successful) * Stealth Flight - Check who target Visits
----------
#[color=008000] POISON IVY [/COLOR]
**Passives:**
* If you kill your Target They will show as Assassin/Cult Leader (Journal is Wiped) * Attacking your target will give you 100% power (bypasses Conceal) * Will show as ns/support only once to a investigative role
**Day Abilities:**
* Secrete - Immune to all death the following night (2 uses)
**Night Abilities:**
* Vine Infusion - 50% chance to Poison Target (1 day cool-down if successful) * Steep - The following night carries 100% Poison Effect
---------
#Notes: The dark knight must kill poison ivy to become a true knight of blue dragon, they can bypass poison ivy's immunity therefor this is there main target before they kill you and regain there full powers.
While poison ivy must win with all neutrals therefor must gain her full powers once the dark knight is destroyed. Once the dark knight is destroyed she gathers her full toxicity in her ivy and can kill whoever she pleases.
journal is removed upon death of the dark knight via poison ivy killing them as a neutral win killer is hard to achieve, therefor it gives her a better chance of staying hidden.
If either target is killed by means other than there counterpart they will keep there current abilities.
The dark knight can be converted and keep the same abilities, But if he becomes assassin or cult leader then poison ivy gains her full powers.
# Now feel free to attack me with whatever you have to say, # I know ruby will smack me hard :slight_smile: # Suggestions are welcome i made this within a hour to please Plex mainly # As he wanted me to enter his competition but i wont i tell you

item.title: Dark Knight Vs Poison Ivy (Plex wanted me to create something don't blame me)
item.dc:creator: PandaPete
item.description:
He has to win with bd
But if he outs himself he could get killed by poison ivy.
Therefore giving guaranteed kills by poison every night.
It’s a way to try and get a neutral evil to win but they have to work for it

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Knight Vs Poison Ivy (Plex wanted me to create something don't blame me)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
PandaPete:

You don’t think that’s to op?

I am thinking in terms of it being stupid to be a dark knight, as it is easier to win as knight by a lot.

A normal knight need not work for his position, but blue dragon goes several nights without the dark knight as a knight.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Knight Vs Poison Ivy (Plex wanted me to create something don't blame me)
item.dc:creator: PandaPete
item.description:
# DARK KNIGHT

Passive:

  • If you Kill your target you become a knight

  • Attacking your target gives you 100% power (bypasses Secrete)

Day Abilities:

  • Conceal - Immune to all death the following night (2 uses)

Night Abilities:

  • Renegade Assassinate - 50% Chance to Kill Target (1 day cool-down if successful)
  • Stealth Flight - Check who target Visits

# POISON IVY

Passives:

  • If you kill your Target They will show as Assassin/Cult Leader (Journal is Wiped)
  • Attacking your target will give you 100% power (bypasses Conceal)
  • Will show as ns/support only once to a investigative role

Day Abilities:

  • Secrete - Immune to all death the following night (2 uses)

Night Abilities:

  • Vine Infusion - 50% chance to Poison Target (1 day cool-down if successful)
  • Steep - The following night carries 100% Poison Effect

#Notes:
The dark knight must kill poison ivy to become a true knight of blue dragon,
they can bypass poison ivy’s immunity therefor this is there main target before they kill you and regain there full powers.

While poison ivy must win with all neutrals therefor must gain her full powers once the dark knight is destroyed.
Once the dark knight is destroyed she gathers her full toxicity in her ivy and can kill whoever she pleases.

journal is removed upon death of the dark knight via poison ivy killing them as a neutral win killer is hard to achieve,
therefor it gives her a better chance of staying hidden.

If either target is killed by means other than there counterpart they will keep there current abilities.

The dark knight can be converted and keep the same abilities,
But if he becomes assassin or cult leader then poison ivy gains her full powers.

Now feel free to attack me with whatever you have to say,

I know ruby will smack me hard

Suggestions are welcome i made this within a hour to please Plex mainly

As he wanted me to enter his competition but i wont i tell you

Read full topic
